products.title: IH/Simmons Bilt C3 Style Jacket
products.description: One of our favourite jacket builds from Simmons Bilt. A 15mm sheepskin, aviator-style jacket, his Racing Spirit x Simmons Bilt collaboration jacket uses the highest quality materials and hardware and is built by one of the top sheepskin makers in the world.

products.title: 21oz Selvedge Denim Type III - Indigo
products.description: A classic returns! Our original Type III jacket, made from our signature 21oz indigo Japanese selvedge denim. No modifications, just true to the original with a shorter body length and no side pockets.

products.title: Built Reversible Bomber Jacket
products.description: Reversible bomber jacket in durable water-repellent nylon with a quilted lining. Relaxed fit featuring a sleeve pocket, exterior flap pockets and interior welt pockets. Embroidery at the lower front.

products.title: Ultra Heavy Flannel Buffalo Check Western Shirt - Red
products.description: To a great extent, our ultra heavy flannel (UHF) shirts define Racing Spirit: heavy, rugged, but amazingly wearable. The 12oz fabric is woven with Aspero cotton from the foothills of the Andes mountains. We double brush it on the inside and single brush it on the outside, resulting in a very soft yet substantial, thick, warm and windproof flannel. This shirt is a wardrobe staple - a western cut in red buffalo check.

products.title: 25oz Selvedge Denim Super Slim Cut Jeans - Indigo
products.description: Our medium/high rise super slim cut jean in our indigo 25oz denim. Woven with an indigo rope-dyed warp and a natural weft, this ultra heavy denim is at the limit of what can be made. Super-stiff when new and requires some "breaking-in"- with time and wear it becomes soft, pliable and very comfy.

products.title: 6.5oz Loopwheel Crew Neck T-Shirt - Grey
products.description: A hefty 6.5oz loopwheel knitted cotton jersey t-shirt. Supremely soft yet extremely durable, these will hold their shape regardless of what you throw at them.

products.title: 6.5oz Loopwheel Crew Neck T-Shirt - Navy
products.description: A hefty 6.5oz loopwheel knitted cotton jersey t-shirt. Supremely soft yet extremely durable, these will hold their shape regardless of what you throw at them.

products.title: Racing Spirit x DicE x Giulio Miglietta Collaboration 21oz Non-Fade Denim Type III Vest with Patch - Superblack
products.description: This very special collaboration between Racing Spirit, DicE Magazine and G.Miglietta comes in the form of our 21oz "Superblack" denim Type III vest, featuring limited edition, hand-embroidered patches. Generously sized to wear over your moto-leathers, both the warp and weft of the denim have been reactive dyed for a fade-resistant finish. Designed from world-renowned chainstitch maestro, Giulio Miglietta, the larger back patch comes pre-attached to the vest - whilst the smaller patch is provided separately (sewing kit included), giving you the option for positioning on either the left or right-hand breast of the vest.
